### All India Institute of Medical Sciences

::::: columns
::: {.column width="40%"}
![](img/aiims.jpeg){width="100%"}
:::

::: {.column width="60%" style="margin-left: 20px;"}
**Location**: New Delhi, India\
**Website**: [https://www.aiims.edu/](https://www.aiims.edu/index.php/en)

All India Institute of Medical Sciences, New Delhi (AIIMS New Delhi), is a public medical research university and hospital in New Delhi, India. The institute is governed by the AIIMS Act, 1956 and operates autonomously under the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare.

### The University of Transdisciplinary Health Sciences and Technology

::::: columns
::: {.column width="40%"}
![](img/tdhs.jpeg){width="100%"}
:::

::: {.column width="60%" style="margin-left: 20px;"}
**Location**: Bangalore, India\
**Website**: [https://www.tdu.edu.in/](https://www.tdu.edu.in/)

University of Trans-Disciplinary Health Sciences and Technology (TDU), formerly Institute of Trans-Disciplinary Health Sciences and Technology, is a private university located in Bangalore, Karnataka, India. The university was established in 2013 by the Foundation for Revitalization of Local Health Tradition (FRLHT) through The Institute of Trans-disciplinary Health Sciences and Technology Act, 2013.
:::

### KEM Hospital Research Centre, Vadu

::::: columns
::: {.column width="40%"}
![](img/kem_vadu.jpeg){width="100%"}
:::

::: {.column width="60%" style="margin-left: 20px;"}
**Location**: Pune, India\
**Website**: [https://www.kemhrcvadu.org/](https://www.kemhrcvadu.org/)

The Vadu Rural Health Program, run under KEMHRC is now an internationally acclaimed research centre for its work and efforts in community health. It was initiated in the late 1970s. VRHP comprises of three pillars, Shirdi Saibaba Hospital, a 30-bed multi-disciplinary rural hospital provides secondary level medical care, Vadu Health and Demographic System and the Research.
:::
:::::
